ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: A placeholder for the Liberation fontset intended for the `fontquiver` package. This fontset covers the 12 combinations of families (sans, serif, mono) and faces (plain, bold, italic, bold italic) supported in R graphics devices.

A placeholder for the Liberation fontset intended for the `fontquiver` package. This fontset covers the 12 combinations of families (sans, serif, mono) and faces (plain, bold, italic, bold italic) supported in R graphics devices.

name: r-fontliberation
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.1.0' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-fontliberation
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: fontLiberation_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/fontLiberation_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/fontLiberation/fontLiberation_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: acdea423e005873aa509e280074a3cef4796e4f7e9d77b3945d77b451ea039f0

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 1007
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('fontLiberation')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('fontLiberation')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=fontLiberation
  license: OFL-1.1
  summary: A placeholder for the Liberation fontset intended for the `fontquiver` package. This
    fontset covers the 12 combinations of families (sans, serif, mono) and faces (plain,
    bold, italic, bold italic) supported in R graphics devices.
  license_family: OTHER
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - jenzopr
